page.title: 02INDUSTRY.
page.content:
{Crofting.} A croft is a small farm.A crofter doesnt earn a lot of money,so many crofters have another job as well.A crofter would own a few cows or sheep and he would own a few fields.Crofting is a way of life and not only an occupation. There used to be several crofts at Druimarbin,but now there are houses and hotels where the crofts used to be.There are still some crofts across the loch in Trislaig.
{Tourism.} Tourism is a very important industry in this area.There are 10 hotels and approximately 200 Bed and Breakfast establishments in this block.Tourists come from all over the world to visit Fort William.Because of its natural beauty.
